Change has been successfully rebased and submitted as e42fb487839b242371b0150ab5b0b89c2d232976
The header define EFI_ERROR_TIME_STAMP (Line #41) and EFI_GENERIC_ERROR_STATUS (Line #16)
It seem I missed this code.
In latest patch set https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/libcper/+/75309/9/include/libcper/edk/Cper.h#17
Should all of these be changed to <> style includes?  These end up being installed so they are system and not project includes, right?

Hi Patric, I tried to update the code as your comments.

As the libpldm, I have to move all of the installed header files `include/libcper`. The libcper `meson.build` will include that folder as include dir.
This allows the `libcper` source files can use the header files in `include/libcper` when the header files are not installed to `/usr/include` directory.

I wonder do we have any way without require moving the header file to `include/libcper`?
See https://mesonbuild.com/Include-directories.html ?  You should be able to set "." to the include_directories.  I'm a little surprised it isn't by default.

It was https://github.com/openbmc/libcper/blob/382ad4c7c33bc0477108e2348e2a54113229f7bf/meson.build#L88 and https://github.com/openbmc/libcper/blob/382ad4c7c33bc0477108e2348e2a54113229f7bf/meson.build#L96 but then I can't use `#include <libcper/edk/Cper.h>` style as your comment. Because the header file is not installed to `/usr/include/libcper` at the time we build the `cper-parser`.
Acknowledged
For non-public headers, including from the same directory is still correct, right?
Yes, it should. Because the `include` folder is include in the build.
Done
Sorry, prior patchset didnt' build so I put in a "quick" fix that is going to be a pain to rebase on this.
I can help on rebase if need.

The PLDM patch set includes some definition in `cper-section-ampere.h` and `cper-section-arm.h` that why the header files are installed in the `libcper` dir.
https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/73237/9/oem/ampere/event/cper.cpp#26
Move this changing to other patch set https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/libcper/+/75654/1
